Houston.Hofheinz Pavilion: Hofheinz Pavilion is a 8,479-seat multi-purpose arena on the University of Houston campus in Houston, Texas, currently undergoing renovation. Located at 3875 Holman Street, it is home to the Houston Cougars men's and women's basketball teams as well as the women's volleyball team. The building is named after Roy Hofheinz his late wife, Irene Cafcalas "Dene" Hofheinz after they donated $1.5 million to help fund construction.
